main event: Several civilian witnesses reported sighting two groups of 3 disc-shaped objects over Vineland, New Jersey on November 9, 1952.
interesting points: The objects were described as glowing and bright, The sighting lasted approximately 36 seconds, Witnesses included a housewife who noted her daughter saw the objects first, The objects changed formation rapidly during the observation, Multiple reliable witnesses reported seeing unusual light formations over two months.
sighted object: two groups of 3 disc-shaped glowing objects
